ticker_text: Welcome to the website where you can join eilis and friends in watching love actually
history:
since 2010, eilis searson has held a yearly screening event in defense of sentimentality, foil garlands, and the film Love Actually itself.

each year, fathers and sons, mothers and daughters, husbands and wives, boyfriends, girlfirends and old friends gather at this event, which is usually staged in eilis searsonâ€™s bedroom. there is a yearly speech by film expert, artist and lecturer aduke king, and a yearly performance by friend of the event, harry stayt. for an invitation, please text 07969038077. all fathers and sons, mothers and daughters, husbands and wives, boyfriends, girlfirends and old friends welcome.

the event is catered by Iceland supermarkets Ltd., in support of martine mccutcheon.

gallery.alt: a man takes a telephone call in front of a blue giant
